scripts.script_content: I think this next one, coming up right now from the , might have been written as a tongue in cheek commentary on romance "A good man is hard to find," indeed! Here it goes: Cass Daley with A Good Man Is Hard to Find..

I've always thought this next song is so poignant, dreaming of building something beautiful together even just with one special kiss. Here's the great Louis Armstrong serenading us all as he croons: A Kiss to Build a Dream On..

I've always thought there was something dreamy and romantic about this tune, like imagining that perfect place where love might blossom. Here's the great clarinetist himself, Artie Shaw with his version of "A Room With a View.".

I wonder, is this song about lost love just a reflection of our times? So many folks out there have had to up and leave without warning. Here are the harmonious sounds of The Ink Spots with their poignant tune, Address Unknown..

I think there must be something in the water around these parts that just makes folks feel carefree and playful, because this next tune is all about letting loose. Here's Fats Waller with Ain't Misbehavin', a perfect example of how jazz can lift your spirits when times get tough out here on our little corner of Appalachia Radio land!.

Billie? Holiday is known for her heartfelt delivery, and she pours every ounce into this song about surrendering your whole self to love. She sings "All of me loves all of you" can't we just let go like that sometimes?

Ladies and gentlemen of New Vegas, it seems the hunt for that perfect partner is a timeless quest we all embark upon. This next tune poignantly captures those moments when love becomes elusive yet oh so desirable. Here's Cass Daley with 'A Good Man Is Hard to Find'..

New Vegas, in the still of this desert night, dreams are all we have. So let us build them high with every tender kiss like dear Louie sings about next it's Louis Armstrong and his sweet serenade: 'A Kiss to Build a Dream On.'.

This next tune is perfect for when you find that special place, New Vegas. The one where life opens up like the door to an enchanting room with nothing but potential ahead and love walking right in. Here's Artie Shaw playing 'A Room With a View'..

With that nostalgic longing, it takes a brave soul to send love letters off into the unknown. Here are the Ink Spats crooning their heart out about an address left blank and so too is my heart as I wonder where those missives landed in this vast wasteland we call life. It's The Ink Spots with Address Unknown!.

Ladies and gentlemen, get ready to kick your heels up high as you sway along ain't no one gonna tell this cat how to misbehave! Here's the incomparable Fats Waller with his signature tune: 'Ain't Misbehavin'.'.

All right, darlings. Let me play you this tune that never fails to get our hearts racing it speaks straight from the soul about surrendering yourself fully and completelyâ€¦ That kind of love is truly intoxicating, isn't it? Here now on Radio New Vegas, Billie Holiday sings All of Me for all my devoted listeners out there tonight..
